mainDescriptionNotAuthenticated: Please login to activate your device
activationCodeLabel: Enter the 6 digit code presented on your TV screen.
success: Activation successful! It may take up to 60 seconds, but your tv app will automatically log in shortly.
activationCodeErrorNotFound: The code entered is incorrect, or may have expired. To gain another code, please hit “refresh” on your TV screen.
activationCodeErrorGeneric: An error occurred during activation. Please try again or contact support.
